alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 2:27PM MST until January 10 at 9:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of between 2 and 4 inches, with isolated amounts up to 6 inches over the higher peaks. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine County, and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snow and wind chill statements will likely be needed for Thursday and Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Western and Central Chouteau County
